plot: In the near future, Virtual-In-Home-Personal-Shoppers (VIPS) are as ubiquitous as cell phones. But one man who wants out of his VIPS subscription learns that pulling the plug isn't that easy.
title: Vips
plot_es: In the near future, Virtual-In-Home-Personal-Shoppers (VIPS) are as ubiquitous as cell phones. But one man who wants out of his VIPS subscription learns that pulling the plug isn't that easy.
